articles.title: Rugby-New Italy skipper Lamaro hopes to make good impression in autumn matches
articles.description: Italy, who finished bottom of the Six Nations with five defeats, take on New Zealand in Rome on Nov. 6, before further tests against Argentina in Treviso on Nov. 13 and Uruguay in Parma on Nov. 20. "The All Blacks are obviously one of the best teams in the world.

articles.title: Motorsport Network Acquires Autoblog Argentina
articles.description: Motorsport Network also announced the launch of InsideEVs Argentina, part of the Inside EV flagship digital property covering electric vehicle news.
articles.content: (Miami, Florida) – October 25, 2021 – Motorsport Network announced today that they have acquired Autoblog Argentina, the country’s most widely-read automotive news site. The Autoblog Argentina site will migrate to the Motorsport Network platform and ... [1688 chars]

articles.title: Why Madonna Almost Cried While Recording 'Don't Cry for Me Argentina'
articles.description: Madonna said it was initially difficult for her to sing "Don't Cry for Me Argentina" from Andrew Lloyd Webber's 'Evita.'

articles.title: Argentina's informal peso down 2.05%, country risk widens to all time high
articles.description: Argentina's informal peso rate weakened 2.05% to 195 per dollar on Friday and country risk shot out 19 basis points to an all-time high 1,672 as inflation soars and policy uncertainty mounts ahead of November congressional elections.
articles.content:
